website_summaries.verdict: An economical pepper mill that features a timeless look and feel.
pros: Ceramic grinding mechanism offers outstanding strength
Enables you to instantly adjust grinding consistency from fine to coarse by rotating the top nut
cons: Sometimes makes a high-pitch, squeaky noise when grinding pepper

customer_reviews.title: Cute elegant functional
customer_reviews.text: I was already pleased with the look but was holding my breath when it came to how well it actually worked. I've had bad experiences with similar products in acrylic where the knob would fly off or parts of the mill broke off. Just a plain nuisance. So far It's been working well and it adjusts beautifully to whatever size grounds you need.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Bet

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: I emailed seller and told them product (pepper mill) worked great for a several months, but a piece came loose inside the grinder and it would no longer grind. All I asked them for was a replacement metal piece. They emailed me back within less than 2 hours and told me they did not have parts but would be happy to send me a replacement. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS SELLER! I also love the grinder. I adjusts to coarse grind which is hard to find in most pepper mills. Can't wait to get my replacement!
customer_reviews.author: L. Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Functional, attractive and does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this three stars because I'm an idiot and apparently too ignorant of how to properly use a pepper mill. I didn't realize you had to loosen the top screw to make coarser pepper come out. Works great and is cheap to boot, quite happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy in Florida

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Works as a pepper grinder should. More difficult to fill, as you have to keep the bar running through it relatively center and the room for peppercorn storage is a bit lacking in size. But very cute and grinds peppercorn well. Seems to be actual wood and not just a vinyl wood print.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This grinder does not put out much pepper regardless of how tight or loose the top nut is. I got much more pepper from the disposable plastic no-name grinder I bought from the spice aisle in the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Joany

customer_reviews.title: Does not adjust for larger grind.
customer_reviews.text: While it nice, there is no adjustment for different grinds of pepper. I have tried to pull up the center shaft, making the grinder move up thus getting a larger grind BUT, it does not work. Its ok for fine grind and possibly salt but if you are like me, i like a larger pepper grind on my food.
customer_reviews.author: GhostRider57

customer_reviews.title: You can adjust how coarse the grind is and it's easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for salt and one for pepper and both are working very well. You can adjust how coarse the grind is and it's easy to handle. The company that provided this product has been very responsive to my questions and needs. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: E. Schips

customer_reviews.title: Will mill with the best of them!!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid hardwood contents. Easy to use and cracks and grinds like a dream. I use telicherry pepper and Himalayan sea salt through my mills and they chew right through them. Though it should be noted that they should only be turns clockwise as turning them counter clockwise will loosen the fastener on the top but no big deal to me!
customer_reviews.author: brandon smith

customer_reviews.title: Good, but doesn’t feel very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: While I do love this pepper grinder (it looks great and functions well), the stem is not very sturdy, and when you fill it you need to be careful to hold it straight so that the top will screw on and the grinder will work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great and serve it's purpose at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Terri S

customer_reviews.title: nice pepper grinder
customer_reviews.text: very nice pepper grinder. I should have bought the 12".
customer_reviews.author: Sut

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: If I had actually spent 30 dollars I would be a lot more upset. This is not a good mill as it broke within two uses. Piece just rotates no grind. Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn C.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy pepper mill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months after I bought it I started having problems with it not grinding. It only works some of the time, if you shake it right so the peppercorns are in the right area. Save your money and buy a better pepper mill, I having tried to work with it and get it to work better but I’m done now.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what I was looking for. It ...
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for. It issmall enogh to fit in my kitchen and grinds very smoothly regardless of grind required.
customer_reviews.author: robert b

customer_reviews.title: Classic Peppermill
customer_reviews.text: Timeless design, quality materials. Great replacement for my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great little Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Works great, been grinding away and like that it’s easy to adjust the granularity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great size as well as nice looking and nice feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size as well as nice looking and nice feeling in the hand. But the piece that keeps the shaft grinding peppercorns comes unattached from the top easily. Thus making each turn of the top useless and requires you to undo the top to retrieve the metal piece which is very difficult to do without needlenose pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Branden Schneider

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive pepper grinder outperforms by far the Peugot grinder I had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Amir T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: After almost 20 years, my old pepper grinder gears have finally given out. This one is a great buy for the price. I can only hope it lasts as long as the previous one I had.
customer_reviews.author: P Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, well-constructed
customer_reviews.text: It grind well and it looks nice. I just got it, so can't speak to how long it will last, but it feels very solid and well-constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Grinds pepper nice and fine the way I like it. Or I can adjust it to be more coarse. My last pepper mill was so inconsistent and would leave huge chunks of pepper. This one seems very well made and is real wood with a nice finish. Looks great on my kitchen table!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fine, please.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this expecting to be able to have coursely ground pepper, but only get fine.
customer_reviews.author: harry satterwhite

customer_reviews.title: Good grinder
customer_reviews.text: Like it easy to use and fill adjustable grind. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The grind adjustment doesnt really seem to do much but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: JesseB

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the restaurant industry for 50 years and used a LOT of pepper mills. this one grinds fast and right, thanks to a metal mechanism. It is not too big and can stay on the kitchen counter. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: mephisto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grinders. Bought two for my kitchen. Great quality, can't go wrong with these
customer_reviews.author: christian Galvan

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, well functioning pepper mill. Quick delivery. Well worth the price! I would recommend this product and this company to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Pepper Mill is just as described; not for big use but for table it works well

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic grinder
customer_reviews.text: The grinder inside isn’t metal so it’s a bit hard to get used to. It’s harder to twist than a metal grinder would be.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything was as expected a pleasure to do business with

customer_reviews.title: NO Bueno
customer_reviews.text: Seriously..don't get this if you plan on using it on the daily.

customer_reviews.title: Simple & timeless
customer_reviews.text: Love it . Fits my hand beautifully & has a nice fine grind setting

customer_reviews.title: Could B Better
customer_reviews.text: It's a good grinder. But jut doesn't hold a lot of Pcorns, and don't know how to adjust the grain of which I like more course.
customer_reviews.author: Robbob

customer_reviews.title: Solid?
customer_reviews.text: ‘Solid wood’, my foot! Very lightweight and not solid at all. I assume it won’t last long....
customer_reviews.author: Pats

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this for a few days but it creates wonderful freshly ground pepper and is easily adjustable to give different size grinds.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: The pepper does not come out good. It is a struggle and comes out very little.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This mill looks lovely, feels very solidly made and is pretty fair to grip for grinding. Working great for our salt.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda K Byatt

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the wood finish, fits in with the look of our kitchen. Wanted something simple and natural looking. Works exactly as it should, easy to fill and use.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Was going to purchase a Le Creuset ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Was going to purchase a Le Creuset mill, then saw this as a cheaper alternative. So glad I went with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT recommend this grinder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents in June 2017. It stopped working 4 months later and wont grind anything. I wanted to try and return it and that is not an option. I would NOT recommend this grinder.

customer_reviews.title: good pepper mill
customer_reviews.text: i like that it looks sleek in my kitchen. the grinding system also works well.

customer_reviews.title: i bought this specifically for a nice coarse grind
customer_reviews.text: does not adjust to a coarse ground as i was hoping, kinda pisses me off, i bought this specifically for a nice coarse grind. over priced for only getting a fine ground and adjusting doenst do anything except for feel loose. dont buy if you want a coarse ground.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Good pepper mill
customer_reviews.text: Good pepper mill a little hard to turn that's why I gave it one star less than perfect I'm sure it'll ease up in time good buy I recommended it

customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. It broke after only a couple of weeks of use. I do not reccomend it, it was a waste of money.

customer_reviews.text: I like the product alot! I am excited about using it in my day to day cooking. I don't like bland foods and if I can give it some fresh seasonings then it will be great. Thank you so much.

customer_reviews.title: Not Functional :-(
customer_reviews.text: The look is good, but its not functioning. It doesn't grind, simply rotating. I am using just as a show piece on the table and have pepper powder in another small container for real use. I wish I returned it withing the return time frame :(. Looks elegant though.
customer_reviews.author: PJ's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It grinds pepper, but doesn't seem to adjust for different sized pepper grinds. Seems cheaply made.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for over a month and love it. Looks great and works even better :)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Owned for about a month so far. Works as expected and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: guy

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Support***UPDATED***
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first couple of months, but then after refilling it for the 3rd time, it stopped working correctly. It turns out a little metal piece got loose (maybe bc of constant use) and now the mill doesn't grind the peppercorns. I have reached out to the seller and manufacturer and have yet to hear back. So much for "lifetime guarantee." Rating would be higher if they actually respond and help me resolve this issue.***************************** I am updating this bc I have received a response. They asked for me to explain in detail and submit pics. No more than 24-hours later, they are mailing out a replacement...I guess I was just being impatient :-P
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fantozzi

customer_reviews.title: Should have spent more money...
customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery well packaged does not come with peppercorns. Very good construction the only thing i disliked was the nut on top kept coming loose i had to tighten it real tight and the pepper comes out too fine.
customer_reviews.author: Belen G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grinder salt/pepper
customer_reviews.text: Ceramic blades do great. I want to see a lot of (salt/pepper) come out with not a lot of effort This one is good, looks cool, nice size, etc a bargain great gift idea
customer_reviews.author: Steven Owen

customer_reviews.title: Works great except you can't really adjust it to grind coursly
customer_reviews.text: Works great except you can't really adjust it to grind coursly. The adjustment goes from fine to extra fine really.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky noise and doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of the box and even still, the grinder makes a sharp high pitched noise whenever I grind pepper. UPDATE: 3 weeks or so later it has basically stopped working, when grinding it puts out so little pepper it may as well be broken
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it doesn't make coarse ground pepper as well as my last grinder. The adjustment knob at the top doesn't stay set quite as well as pricier grinders. For the money it works fine and feels solid. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Coralline Algae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price and works well. Please don't listen to those who complaint about the product.

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good pepper grinder.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, holds up well. Only complaint I have is that I wish it held more peppercorns.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks marvelous
customer_reviews.text: I now have fresh black pepper again. Works great and looks marvelous. Outstanding price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after the plastic clear one I bought from a big box store broke after only 2 years. The old one had metal grinders and was hard to turn. This one has ceramic ones and it grinds so much easier and smoother. Wish I had bought it sooner and now I don't dread having to grind fresh pepper. I'll update my review if anything changes after long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smathers

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a cheap plastic throw-away grinder we picked up from the grocery store. The difference between the two is like night and day. Much easier and faster to grind fresh pepper from this and I love it!

customer_reviews.title: Now I can have freshly ground black pepper like the National cooking hosts use on their food show

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pepper mill!

product_meta.title: IEOVO 8" Wood Pepper Mill, Solid Wood and Adjustable Ceramic Grinder, Brown
product_meta.description:
IEOVO Traditional 8 inch Wooden Pepper Mills.
The ceramic grinding mechanism that is fully adjustable from coarse to fine, and won't absorb flavors or odors.

Easy to use and refill.

We are dedicated to provide quality products and superb services.

Lifetime Guarantee
feature_bullets: 🎄8" tall traditional wooden pepper mill, Oak finish
🎄Adjustable grinding consistency from fine to coarse by adjusting the top nut
🎄Easy to fill. Simply unscrew the top nut and remove the wooden end cap to reach the hopper

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars270 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
